# iosxe_igmp_snooping (Resource)

This resource can manage the IGMP Snooping configuration.

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "iosxe_igmp_snooping" "example" {
  querier                         = true
  querier_entry_version           = 2
  querier_entry_max_response_time = 10
  querier_entry_timer_expiry      = 120
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `delete_mode` (String) Configure behavior when deleting/destroying the resource. Either delete the entire object (YANG container) being managed, or only delete the individual resource attributes configured explicitly and leave everything else as-is. Default value is `all`.
  - Choices: `all`, `attributes`
- `device` (String) A device name from the provider configuration.
- `querier` (Boolean) IGMP querier disable/enable
- `querier_entry_max_response_time` (Number) IGMP querier maximum response time (sec)
  - Range: `1`-`25`
- `querier_entry_timer_expiry` (Number) IGMP querier other querier time out (sec)
  - Range: `60`-`300`
- `querier_entry_version` (Number) IGMP version
  - Range: `1`-`3`

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The path of the object.

## Import

Import is supported using the following syntax:

The [`terraform import` command](https://developer.hashicorp.com/terraform/cli/commands/import) can be used, for example:

```shell
terraform import iosxe_igmp_snooping.example ""
```
